remarks: A real function whose domain is unbounded above converges to at most one limit.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-May-2016.)
statement:
rlimuni.1 $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> CC ) $.
rlimuni.2 $e |- ( ph -> sup ( A , RR* , < ) = +oo ) $.
rlimuni.3 $e |- ( ph -> F ~~>r B ) $.
rlimuni.4 $e |- ( ph -> F ~~>r C ) $.
rlimuni $p |- ( ph -> B = C ) $.
